Package meka.experiment.evaluators

Class CrossValidation

  • java.lang.Object
    • meka.events.LogObject
      • meka.experiment.evaluators.AbstractEvaluator
        • meka.experiment.evaluators.CrossValidation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ThreadLimiter, LogSupporter, Evaluator, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.Randomizable

    public class CrossValidation
extends AbstractEvaluator
implements weka.core.Randomizable, ThreadLimiter
    Evaluates the classifier using cross-validation. Order can be preserved.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
